alert.note: Alert for Dane; Green; Rock (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 3:20PM CDT until August 28 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GREEN...ROCK AND EASTERN DANE COUNTIES... At 320 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Madison to near Stoughton to near Janesville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Madison, Janesville, Beloit, Sun Prairie, Fitchburg, Stoughton, Verona, Oregon, McFarland, Monona, Milton, Edgerton, Evansville, Marshall, Cottage Grove, Deerfield, Shorewood Hills, Cambridge, Orfordville and Brooklyn. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
